00010 class INode {
00011 public:
00012         int id;

00014                 {return *this;};

00019 // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
00020 struct Record { 
00021         Record() {;};
00022         virtual void Serialize(CArchive& ar) {
00023                 if (ar.IsStoring())     {
00024                         ar << d << rho << psi << u;
00025                 }
00026                 else {
00027                         ar >> d >> rho >> psi >> u;
00028                 }
00029                 node->Serialize(ar);
00030         };
00031         INode* node;    // points to the node
00032         double d;               // distance from cluster id1 to event id2
00033         double rho;             // M-estimator
00034         double psi;             // W-estimator
00035         double u;               // membership in cluster id1 of event id2
00036         double u_RR;    // sharing part of u
00037         double u_Bias;  // bias part of u
00038         };
00039 // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
00040 class ICluster : public INode {
00041 public:
00042         CMap<int, int&, Record*, Record*>                       rec;                    // array of membership parameters
00043         int                                             nNodes;                                                         // number of nodes (assuming crisp clustering)
00044         double                                  T;                                                                      // median of cluster distances
00045         double                                  S;                                                                      // median of cluster absolute deviations 
00046         double                                  K;                                                                      // integration constant (makes all rho's througout the clusters reach the same maximum)
00047         double                                  N;                                                                      // robust cardinality
00048         ICluster&                               operator=(const ICluster& that) 
00049                 {return *this;};
00050         virtual void                    Add(INode* that) = 0;                           // add element
00051         virtual void                    Serialize(CArchive& ar) = 0;
00052         void                                    UpdateMedian();
00053         void                                    UpdateMAD();
00054         void                                    UpdateRho(double cTuning);
00055         void                                    UpdatePsi(double cTuning);
00056         void                                    UpdateN();
00057 };

00061 // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
00062 struct ClusteringParams {
00063         int                     maxIterations;          // maximum number of iterations
00064         int                     maxClusters;            // initial number of clusters
00065         double                  minNodeDistance;        // a threshold to remove nodes that are too far away from any other nodes (i.e outliers)
00066         double                  maxNodeDistance;        // a threshold to group nodes to form initial clusters
00067         double                  eta0;                           // multiplier: controls the speed of clustering
00068         double                  tau;                            // exponent: controls the speed of clustering
00069         double                  nIteration0;            // after this iteration clustering will slow down
00070         double                  cTuningMin;                     // a tuning constant
00071         double                  cTuning0;                       // a tuning constant
00072         double                  cTuningDelta;           // a tuning constant
00073         double                  minCardinality;         // minimum cardinality to keep cluster alive
00074 };
